app_description: Come and download the best translation app Hello Translator for your iPhone no matter any text or picture you can immediately get translations in more than 80 different languages. Features: Recognize over fifty languages Translated into over 80 languages Advanced OCR technology Support text voice and camera translation Edit copy share anytime How to use: Select original language Enter text voice or take photos directly Select the language to be translated Click the translate button Yes it s that simple. Hello Translator is a good tool in your life no matter if it is menus work documents or study materials no matter where you are when you need to translate take out your iPhone open Hello Translator choose text voice or OCR mode input what you want to translate and you can get the translation results immediately and you will have unlimited use.
